overview: Three student filmmakers run into trouble in the woods as they set out to make a documentary about the Blair Witch. This is a short parody of "The Blair Witch Project".
tagline: In October of 1799, three student filmmakers set out to make a documentary. Unfortunately, film was not yet invented. In 1999, 324 people set out to parody "The Blair Witch Project"... only one starred Linda Blair.
title: The Blair Bitch Project
